description: This Dart source file defines the SearchScreen widget for a Flutter application, which provides a user interface for searching and filtering baby names based on various criteria such as gender, language, rashi, and starting character.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides the main interface for searching and filtering baby names.

classes.name: ._SearchScreenState
classes.description: State class for SearchScreen managing search input, filters, and display of filtered names.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, loads starting characters for filtering.

methods.name: _loadStartingCharacters
methods.description: Fetches the list of starting characters from provider.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the search controller when widget is removed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree displaying the search bar, filters, and result grid.

methods.name: _buildFilters
methods.description: Creates the UI for filtering options.

methods.name: _buildCharacterFilter
methods.description: Creates the starting character filter dropdown.

methods.name: _buildFilterChip
methods.description: Creates a styled filter chip for displaying selected filters.
